txt.en: 'The dance will begin now! Come, shall we dance?'
'Great job! Wonderful! You have all been part of the festival-dance! We will dance again in 20 minutes.'
'Look at me and dance step one!'
'Now follow me in doing the second dance.'
'Dance three is the step here.'

'Welcome to the festival, friend. I see that you would like to participate in the dancing and rejoicing that occurs when the festival comes to the Valley. I, too, would love to dance in joyous merriment.\n\n'Every twenty minutes, I will lead a dance in celebration of the festival. I would love for you to come join me when the time has come!'
'I am pleased to teach you the dance of the Elves. It is an important rite of passage that you have earned, young one. You should be very proud.'
The Elf-dance has begun

It is festival time! A time of dance and celebration. Come dance with the Elves and learn their steps.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

The Dance Leader is in Duillond near the stables.\n\nWait for the Elf dance-celebration to begin and follow the instructions of the Dance Leader.

The Dance Leader is in Duillond near the stables.\n\nHaving completed the dance steps required, speak to the Dance Leader to learn the dance of the Elves.
